a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Before 1950, the data comes only from full-time production workers (non-agricultural activities). Starting in 1950,
estimates cover total hours worked in the economy as measured primarily from National Accounts data.
Data source: Huberman & Minns (2007) and PWT 9.1 (2019)
Note: We plot the data from Huberman & Minns (2007) and extend coverage using an updated vintage of PWT, which uses the same
underlying source. Due to differences in measurement, comparability between countries is limited.
